reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, with one mentioning its shadow patterning, and appreciate its nice fit that hits around the knees. Customers describe it as flattering, with one noting it has a bigger middle area.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: Fit well! Very flowy and stretchy. A good length even for a taller woman like myself. Super comfortable and the texture is too cute. Worth the money! Read more
items.author: Bri

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!!!
items.body: This is an absolutely adorable dress. I am 5'3 and its hard to find a dress thats not too long. This dress hits around my knees and gives me a waist. Super cute, don't regret buying it for one second. Read more
items.author: Dittosmom

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color and fit
items.body: The color on this dress is more of a periwinkle, but its gorgeous. The dress is very flattering and hits just right. The length is appropriate for work settings if you aren't squatting down a lot. The only complaint I have is that the sleeves feel a bit tight by the armpits. Read more
items.author: KC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love
items.body: I have to say, I've been trying to find a style of dress that would look nice on me for a wedding. I saw this thought it's cute and in the brides color, so let's try it. It isn't thick material so it perfect. I'm looking forward to putting it on and getting all dressed up for the wedding. Now I need to make a few comments: 1st - I'm 62, so no spring chicken but I also hate dressing like an old lady. 2nd - I have lost 70 lbs and love that I can finally fit into dresses that look good without the huge print that for some reason everyone seems to think overweight women want to wear. Not me! I love everything about this dress, it's long enough, comes on several colors. If you even remotely like it, try it, you won't be disappointed. Read more
items.author: Danna Fox

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!
items.body: This dress is so cute! And the quality is fantastic! It is true to size, I am usually a size 4 and I got a small and it fit great! Read more
items.author: Taylor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wedding Guest Dress
items.body: Wedding guest dress. Perfect fit and flair. Easy to wear, comfortable and many compliments. Material was perfect for a beautiful Minnesota September day. Read more
items.author: Donna Plumbo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it!
items.body: This is an absolutely stunning dress! The fit is so flattering! The fabric is lightweight but sturdy and the shadow patterning is beautiful. The fabric is flowy but not clingy and washes/dries beautifully! It travels well also - no wrinkles after being in a suitcase! I consistently wear an XL in Maurice’s and Old Navy so I got an XL. It is slightly more snug than the other two brands. I am 5’3” tall and 193 lbs with a 29” inseam. This dress hits me right at the top of my knee. Read more
items.author: MrsMaddawg4

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy!
items.body: Such a cute dress for family photos for my 20-year-old! She loved it! Size, quality, and value were great! Read more
items.author: leighill

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Apricot, Black, Navy Blue, Dark Green, Light Blue, Lake Blue, Wine Red, White, Caramel, Rust Red, Green, Chocolate Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
